predictions.text: By 2025-10-15, Keurig Dr Pepper will announce a definitive agreement to acquire JDE Peet’s in a transaction valued at $15 billion or more.
predictions.verification_criteria: An official press release or regulatory filing (e.g., KDP 8-K or JDE Peet’s AFM/Euronext announcement) explicitly announcing a definitive acquisition/merger agreement, with stated equity or enterprise value >= $15B.
monitoring_signals: Bloomberg/WSJ deal scoop updates and exclusivity reports
Unusual trading halts or volatility in JDEP on Euronext
Board approvals, antitrust pre-filings, or leak of deal financing terms
predictions.rationale: Multiple reports suggest advanced talks; execution risk from financing, valuation, and antitrust remains.

predictions.text: By 2025-09-10, the Comet AI browser will publish a security advisory and release a patch addressing the August 2025 prompt-injection account-draining vulnerability.
predictions.verification_criteria: Public advisory or release notes from Comet explicitly referencing the August 2025 prompt-injection/account-draining issue, with fixed version numbers; or an NVD/CVE entry listing fixed versions released by the deadline.
evidence: Vendor advisories/release notes on the Comet official site or repositories
monitoring_signals: CVE assignment and NVD entry publication
Comet release notes on website/GitHub; app store update logs
Security researchers confirming mitigation effectiveness
predictions.rationale: High-severity user-impacting bug; typical vendor cadence is to hotfix within 1–2 weeks.

predictions.text: By 2025-09-07, Cloudflare will publish a detailed postmortem with root cause and corrective actions for the August 21, 2025 outage.
predictions.verification_criteria: A Cloudflare blog or status page post titled as an incident report/postmortem describing root cause and listing remediation or preventive measures for the Aug 21, 2025 incident.
monitoring_signals: Updates on Cloudflare status page incident summary
Cloudflare blog RSS feed entries labeled post-incident analysis
Official posts from Cloudflare leadership (CTO/CEO) outlining RCA
predictions.rationale: Cloudflare typically publishes thorough RCAs within ~1–2 weeks for major incidents.

predictions.text: A Starship integrated flight test (IFT-10) will lift off from Starbase, Texas by 2025-09-30 (mission outcome after liftoff not required).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirmation of liftoff via SpaceX official stream/X post or FAA AST launch record identifying Starship IFT-10 occurring on or before the deadline.
monitoring_signals: FAA license updates or TFR/NOTAMs for Boca Chica
Cameron County road closures and static fire tests
SpaceX webcast scheduling and tanking rehearsals
predictions.rationale: Recent scrub suggests readiness; SpaceX typically turns around quickly pending FAA windows and weather.

predictions.text: By 2025-09-30, the U.S. 10-year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS10) will close at or below 3.95% on at least one trading day.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using FRED daily close for DGS10, check if any closing observation on or before the deadline is <= 3.95%.
monitoring_signals: Fed communications and September FOMC odds
CPI/PCE prints, payrolls, and ISM data surprises
Treasury auctions and term-premium moves; risk-off flows
predictions.rationale: Markets are pricing a September cut; soft data and risk aversion could pull long rates lower.

predictions.text: From 2025-08-25 close to 2025-09-30 close, KraneShares CSI China Internet ETF (KWEB) will underperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 4.0 percentage points based on adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute total return using adjusted close: Return = (AdjClose_end/AdjClose_start - 1). Verify [Return_KWEB - Return_SPY] <= -0.040 from 2025-08-25 close to 2025-09-30 close.
monitoring_signals: China macro data (credit impulse, retail sales, PMI) and policy support
USD/CNY moves; ADR/HK listing performance (BABA/Tencent/Meituan)
Property-sector stress headlines and regulatory actions
predictions.rationale: China growth and property risks weigh on internet sentiment versus resilient U.S. large caps.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, the U.S. 2s10s Treasury yield spread (FRED: DGS10 minus DGS2, daily close) will be positive (>0 bps) on at least three trading days.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using FRED daily closes for DGS10 and DGS2, count days with (DGS10 − DGS2) > 0 between now and the deadline; success requires at least 3 such days.
monitoring_signals: Shift in Fed path expectations; term premium changes
Inflation and growth surprises affecting 2y vs 10y differently
Treasury issuance mix and QT expectations
predictions.rationale: As cuts approach, curve likely re-steepens episodically even absent a full regime shift.
